welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Castellanza, known for its beautiful historical landmarks and delicious Italian cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the city's unique culture and enjoy all that it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Business Terminal
terminals.description: The business terminal at Lugano Airport provides exclusive services for business travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
